title: Question for PERMANENTLY SUSPENDED!!!
body: i do reported our spport last night which is 0/16/4 in 40 mins. today when i lock in it told me my account is PERMANENTLY SUSPENDED and i didn't receive any email from league of legends.  is anyone can told me what to do and how to unlock my account?{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body:
Please follow up your own thread before making another duplicate thread
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behaviour/EZ6Aq6nZ-just-need-help-for-permanently-suspended

From Riot Gehirn 5 hours ago
> Hi Mr Peng Killer, as you're now aware your account was suspended due to a chargeback that needs repayment. Please continue to follow through with the instructions in your ticket, and a support rep will assess if the account can be unbanned.


From MasterMirkinen 6 hours ago
> Hey Mr Peng Killer,

> Normally we send emails when permaban players. You should contact player support for more information but from what I can see, you recently purchased RP with credit card and then charged back (either you or perhaps parents?).
Have a check and once you have identified why this happened, please contact player support.
I'm not 100% sure (I'm asking but I have not received an answer yet) but I believe if you resolve the issue, your account will be unlocked.

> MM


Hope this helps :)
